Title: Relates to requiring tobacco products to contain certain items on their packaging
Summary: Requires cigarette and electronic cigarette packaging to include certain warnings as well as a list of ingredients and prohibits the packaging from including certain marketing language that makes it more enticing for minors to buy.
LawCode: Amd ยง399, add ยง398-f, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring tobacco products to contain certain items on their packaging
